**Row Operations:**

Step 1: $r_2 := r_2 - (2)r_1$
$\begin{bmatrix} 1 & 1 & -1 & | & 1 & 0 & 0 \\ 0 & 1 & 1 & | & -2 & 1 & 0 \\ 1 & 1 & -1 & | & 0 & 0 & 1 \end{bmatrix}$
